titleInfo.title: Wrestling match at the National Guard Armory (16588)

mods.abstract: One color window card (red on white) announcing the World's Greatest Professional Wrestling with Jack Donovan, Woodrow Bass, Tony Miller and Melvin Kimble versus Burr Head Jones, Joe Turner, Mike Jackson and Buddy Wayne at the National Guard Armory on June 13. Poster features metal photoplates of wrestlers. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/28522.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
